output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, "CMF: 31240003" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Nicolae Ciucă" who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 4).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram with an estimated reach of 100,001-500,000 people.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly has an electoral objective: - Directly calls for votes: "Pe 24 noiembrie votăm Nicolae Ciucă președinte!" - Promotes candidate qualities: "România are nevoie de un președinte cu experiență" - Clear campaign messaging
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content but rather direct campaign messaging.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is official party communication (PNL Teleorman) with CMF number.
This is a clear violation of Article 55 t) because: - It's active after the propaganda period for presidential elections has ended - It explicitly calls for voting for a specific candidate - It's a paid promotion still running after the campaign period - Contains CMF number confirming it's official campaign material

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Direct call to vote for specific candidate - Paid distribution on social media - Official party communication - Explicit electoral messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Național Liberal Teleorman, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei, prin postarea cu ID 1294693224868664 pe Facebook, care îndeamnă explicit la votarea candidatului Nicolae Ciucă în data de 24 noiembrie ("Pe 24 noiembrie votăm Nicolae Ciucă președinte!"). Postarea este una plătită, cu număr CMF 31240003, distribuită după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, având un impact estimat între 100,001 și 500,000 de persoane, reprezentând astfel o încălcare clară a prevederilor legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
